CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 16, 1951, pg. 9 reads: "Those Who Received Degrees At Pitt - Rain...change in plans for a commencement on the ..Pittsburgh lawn here Wednesday morning. As...receiving degrees from Pitt undergraduate...given them at ceremonies at 10:30 A.M. in...Degrees from graduate schools at Pitt were...ceremony later the same day at 2:30 P.M. in ...The Courier cameraman was able to snap the persons shown above as they prepared to receive their degrees in time for this week's deadline.  There'll be more pictures of degree winners, both from the undergraduate school and the graduate school of Pitt, as well as Carnegie Institute of Technology's graduates printed in next week's edition of the Courier.  Duquesne University's graduates were printed last week....Right photo: Mary Louise Amaker was graduate from the Pitt five-year course in nursing education, the only nationally accredited college nursing program in Pennsylvania.  Dr. Wilvar C. Waller finished his course in Dental School. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of University of Pittsburgh graduates Mary Louise Amaker and Dr. Wilvar C. Waller, standing in room in Syria Mosque, Oakland
